entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h late this morning. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Monday 26 December 2022
